text: Hi Tanya, please let me know if this is resolved for you. Also, I would recommend following the information in our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started|Quick Start> guide where you can spin up an App Developer Account and then generate testing Hubs for 90 days (which can be renewed from the App Dev Dashboard at any time). As this will allow you to trial the CMS longer.

A client I’m working with wants to remove the /blog slug from the blog pages.  I’m able to edit this in the Settings => Website => Blog => Blog root URL.

But anytime I create a new blog post it still has the /blog in the url. Is is possible to remove this?
